Date: Saturday, 5/13/1990
Subject: Progress of Rick White
Dear Sir,
Rick White is doing pretty good at A Daytona Tortugas!
He has an ERA of 2.55, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Sincerely,
Herm Winningham
